Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I use GenAI to grade my assessments using the provided criteria, before I hand it in so that I am able to make all the necessary changes. I using GenAI for this purpose has improved my grades.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI and my teachers feedback made me feel like I was headed in the right direction.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI provides in depth feedback on all parts of the marking criteria even if the work has been done well. Teacher feedback often doesn’t provide feedback if the work is done well and doesn’t provide in depth feedback otherwise.
